"Na ne babanyin Jehosafat dzii hen wɔ n: "Na ɔdze dɔm guguu Juda nkurow a wɔabɔ ho ban nyinara mu
na ɔhyɛɛ noho dzen dze tsiaa Israel.": na ɔdze bansifo sisii Juda asaase do
"#1 Ahe 15.24": na Efraim nkurow a n’egya Asa gyegyee no mu."

na ɔhyɛɛ noho dzen dze tsiaa Israel.": osiandɛ ɔnantseew n’egya David n’akwan a odzi kan no mu

"Na ne babanyin Jehosafat dzii hen wɔ n: "na mbom ɔhwehwɛɛ n’egya ne Nyankopɔn no
na ɔhyɛɛ noho dzen dze tsiaa Israel.": na ɔnantseew ne mbransɛm no mu
"#1 Ahe 15.24": na nnyɛ Israel ndzeyɛɛ no ekyir a."

"Na ne babanyin Jehosafat dzii hen wɔ n: "Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE tsintsiim ahendzi no wɔ ne nsamu; na Juda nyinara dze ayɛyɛdze brɛɛ Jehosafat; na onyaa adze na enyidzi piigyan."
"Na onyaa EWURADZE no som ho enyigye: na nkyii so oyiyii mbea sorɔnsorɔm na Aserim no fii Juda."
"Eso n’ahendzi no mu afe a otsia ebiasa no mu no ɔsomaa ne mbapɔmba
column8: dɛ wɔnkɛkyerɛkyerɛ wɔ Juda nkurow no mu;"

column11: na Tob-adonija a wɔyɛ Levifo no ka hɔn ho; na asɔfo no
column12: Elisama na Jehoram so ka hɔn ho."

na ɔhyɛɛ noho dzen dze tsiaa Israel.": dɛ wɔwɔ EWURADZE ne mbra nwoma no wɔ hɔn nkyɛn; na wokekyimakyimaa Juda nkurow no nyinara mu; na wɔkɛkyerɛkyerɛe wɔ ɔman no mu."

"Na ne babanyin Jehosafat dzii hen wɔ n: "Na EWURADZE ho suro baa asaase a wɔabɔ Juda ho aprɔw no mu ahendzi nyinara do
na ɔhyɛɛ noho dzen dze tsiaa Israel.": ma dɛm ntsi wɔnnye Jehosafat enndzi ako."

"Na ne babanyin Jehosafat dzii hen wɔ n: "Na Filistiafo no mu binom dze ayɛyɛdze
na ɔhyɛɛ noho dzen dze tsiaa Israel.": na ɔtowyi dwetɛ brɛɛ Jehosafat; Arabiafo no so dze nguankuw nguankuw brɛɛ no

"Na ne babanyin Jehosafat dzii hen wɔ n: "Na Jehosafat yɛɛ kɛse mbordo; na osisii adan na adzekora nkurow wɔ Juda."
"Na onyaa ndwuma pii wɔ Juda nkurow no mu; na mbarimba akofo
"Na hɔn nkanee dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee nye yi: Juda mu
na ɔhyɛɛ noho dzen dze tsiaa Israel.": mpem do asafohemfo no; ɔsafohen Adna
"#1 Ahe 15.24": na mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam mpemahaasa ka no ho:"

"Na ne babanyin Jehosafat dzii hen wɔ n: "na ɔsafohen Jehohanan na odzi no do
na ɔhyɛɛ noho dzen dze tsiaa Israel.": na nyimpa mpemahaenu eduowɔtwe ka no ho:"

"Na ne babanyin Jehosafat dzii hen wɔ n: "na ɔno so no do na Zikri ne ba Amasia a ɔdze noho maa EWURADZE ɔpɛ do no dzi; na mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam mpemahaenu ka no ho:"
"na Benjamin mu; Eliada ɔbarimba ɔkatakyi a ɔyɛ ndam bi
na ɔhyɛɛ noho dzen dze tsiaa Israel.": na nyimpa a wɔdze egyen na kyɛm emiamia mpemahaenu ka no ho:"
na nyimpa mpemɔha eduowɔtwe a woesiesie hɔnho ama ɔsa ka no ho."

"Na ne babanyin Jehosafat dzii hen wɔ n: "Woyinom nye hɔn a wɔsom ɔhen no
na ɔhyɛɛ noho dzen dze tsiaa Israel.": ɔsor hɔn a ɔhen no dze hɔn guguu Juda nyinara mu nkurow a wɔabobɔ ho ban no mu no."
